languages.text: {n}За необременительной беседой о пустяках вы успеваете хорошо рассмотреть Наместника Владайма. Его лицо — сухое и сосредоточенное, жесты — краткие и твердые, а речь спокойная и негромкая — словно он привык, что его всегда внимательно слушают. Судя по его внимательному взгляду, он также изучал вас все это время.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}За необременительной беседой о пустяках вы успеваете хорошо рассмотреть наместника Владайма. Его лицо — сухое и сосредоточенное, жесты — краткие и твердые, а речь спокойная и негромкая — словно он привык, что его всегда внимательно слушают. Судя по его внимательному взгляду, он также изучал вас все это время.{\n}

languages.text: {n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Tocara. His expression is aloof and focused, his gestures curt and firm, and his speech calm and quiet — as though he is used to people always listening to what he says. Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}За необременительной беседой о пустяках вы успеваете хорошо рассмотреть Наместника Владайма. Судя по его внимательному взгляду, он также изучал вас все это время.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Vladaym. His expression is dry and focused, his gestures are curt and firm, and his speech is calm and quiet — like he's used to people always listening to what he's saying. Judging by his observant gaze, he's been likewise studying you this whole time.{/n}

{n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Vladaym. Judging by his observant gaze, he's been likewise studying you this whole time.{/n}

Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}

Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}

{n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Tocara. His expression is aloof and focused, his gestures curt and firm, and his speech calm and quiet — as though he is used to people always listening to what he says. Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}

languages.text: {n}世間話をしている間に、トカラ領主という人物を観察するチャンスがやってきた。男の顔つきは近寄りがたそうでビシッとしていて、身振りはそっけなく落ち着きがあり、話し方は穏やかかつ物静かだ。まるで常に自分の話を聞いてもらうことに慣れているようだ。ジロジロとまとわりつく視線から判断して、相手はずっとこちらを順々に観察していたのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Tocara. His expression is aloof and focused, his gestures curt and firm, and his speech calm and quiet — as though he is used to people always listening to what he says. Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}世間話をしている間に、トカラ領主という人物を観察するチャンスがやってきた。男の顔つきは近寄りがたそうでビシッとしていて、身振りはそっけなく落ち着きがあり、話し方は穏やかかつ物静かだ。まるで常に自分の話を聞いてもらうことに慣れているようだ。ジロジロとまとわりつく視線から判断して、相手はずっとこちらを順々に観察していたのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你们闲聊的时候，你终于有机会好好打量打量托卡拉总督。他的表情冷漠专注，手势简洁坚定，言语平稳安静。看起来，他已经习惯了人们听他发号施令。从他敏锐的目光来看，他一直在仔细打量着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Tocara. His expression is aloof and focused, his gestures curt and firm, and his speech calm and quiet — as though he is used to people always listening to what he says. Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你们闲聊的时候，你终于有机会好好打量打量托卡拉总督。他的表情冷漠专注，手势简洁坚定，言语平稳安静。看起来，他已经习惯了人们听他发号施令。从他敏锐的目光来看，他一直在仔细打量着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mientras conversáis, tienes la oportunidad de hacerte una idea del Señor Tocara. Su expresión es distante y concentrada; sus gestos, bruscos y firmes, y su discurso, tranquilo y sosegado, como si estuviera acostumbrado a que escucharan siempre sus palabras. A juzgar por su mirada atenta, lleva todo este tiempo estudiándote pausadamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Tocara. His expression is aloof and focused, his gestures curt and firm, and his speech calm and quiet — as though he is used to people always listening to what he says. Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras conversáis, tienes la oportunidad de hacerte una idea del Señor Tocara. Su expresión es distante y concentrada; sus gestos, bruscos y firmes, y su discurso, tranquilo y sosegado, como si estuviera acostumbrado a que escucharan siempre sus palabras. A juzgar por su mirada atenta, lleva todo este tiempo estudiándote pausadamente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tout en discutant de tout et de rien, vous profitez de l'occasion qui se présente à vous pour jauger le suzerain Tocara. Il semble distant et concentré, ses gestes sont brusques et fermes, et il parle de manière calme et posée, comme s'il avait l'habitude d'être écouté attentivement par ses interlocuteurs. À en croire son regard observateur, lui aussi vous scrute depuis déjà un bon moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Tocara. His expression is aloof and focused, his gestures curt and firm, and his speech calm and quiet — as though he is used to people always listening to what he says. Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout en discutant de tout et de rien, vous profitez de l'occasion qui se présente à vous pour jauger le suzerain Tocara. Il semble distant et concentré, ses gestes sont brusques et fermes, et il parle de manière calme et posée, comme s'il avait l'habitude d'être écouté attentivement par ses interlocuteurs. À en croire son regard observateur, lui aussi vous scrute depuis déjà un bon moment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Während des Plauderns hast du Gelegenheit, Lehnsherr Tocara genauer zu betrachten. Sein Ausdruck ist unnahbar und konzentriert, seine Sprechweise ruhig und besonnen – als wäre er daran gewöhnt, dass andere immer genau zuhören, wenn er etwas sagt. Seinem prüfenden Blick nach zu urteilen, hat auch er dich die ganze Zeit gemustert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Tocara. His expression is aloof and focused, his gestures curt and firm, and his speech calm and quiet — as though he is used to people always listening to what he says. Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Während des Plauderns hast du Gelegenheit, Lehnsherr Tocara genauer zu betrachten. Sein Ausdruck ist unnahbar und konzentriert, seine Sprechweise ruhig und besonnen – als wäre er daran gewöhnt, dass andere immer genau zuhören, wenn er etwas sagt. Seinem prüfenden Blick nach zu urteilen, hat auch er dich die ganze Zeit gemustert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Muhabbet ederken Emîr Tocara'yı ölçüp tartma şansın da oluyor. İfadesi soğuk ve odaklı, jestleri sert ve net, konuşması ise insanların her dediğini dinlemesine alışkınmış gibi sakin ve sessiz. Dikkatli bakışlarına bakılırsa o da ortama girdiğin andan beridir seni tartıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}While you are engaged in small talk, you get a chance to take the measure of Liege Tocara. His expression is aloof and focused, his gestures curt and firm, and his speech calm and quiet — as though he is used to people always listening to what he says. Judging by his observant gaze, he has been studying you in turn this whole time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Muhabbet ederken Emîr Tocara'yı ölçüp tartma şansın da oluyor. İfadesi soğuk ve odaklı, jestleri sert ve net, konuşması ise her dediğini dinleyen insanlara alışkınmış gibi sakin ve sessiz. Dikkatli bakışlarına bakılırsa o da seni tartıyor.{/n}
